sentence.Network_en: Its tallest volcano, long extinct, is Olympus Mons.
sentence.Network_cn: 它最高的火山是早已熄灭的奥林波斯山。

sentence.Network_en: Aphrodite fled weeping to Mount Olympus to be healed and comforted.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿芙罗狄蒂哭泣着逃奔到奥林匹斯山上去养伤并求得安慰.

sentence.Network_en: He drenched Vulcan with wine, conducted him to Olympus.
sentence.Network_cn: 请伏尔甘饮了美酒, 然后引他到奥林匹斯山上去.

means.word_mean: 1. a mountain peak in northeast Greece near the Aegean coast; believed by ancient Greeks to be the dwelling place of the gods (9,570 feet high)
